divs: Sighting DetailsCamera: Cannon SD 970 IS 12.1 MP Picture shot using timer Where: San Francisco, CA waterfront. Pier 14 (concrete walkway jutting out into Bay about 150 yards.) When: Tuesday, November 24, 2009 6:00 PM Purpose was to take pictures of the Embarcadero Center Xmas lighting. Camera set on timer. Tripod used. Second shot taken immediately, (46 sec), after "blue moon" shows no "blue moon." "Blue moon" was not seen on LED screen by either me or my companion. Set timer and camera took picture. We never saw the "blue moon" until we looked at picture. Since we didn't see it until viewing printout no motion was observed.
trends: There have been 127 other sightings in San Francisco
There were no other sightings in San Francisco on or around November 24th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: "Blue moon" appeared briefly while taking picture of Xmas lights in SF
